name: Gazelle Gardener
description:
After buying some suspicious fertilizer, your plant has come to life in the shape of a giant gazelle!

Use boom seed packs which you can find around the map to both attack the boss and launch yourself through the air.

This game was made with the "Anything and Everything (supported by Anything World)" diversifier from the Game Dev London site. Specifically, it was used to animate the bosses movement, and I am quite happy with how those animations turned out!

Made for the Game Dev London x GGJ 2023 in 48 hours with the theme "Roots".
